Name: Easy Game
About the game: Easy Game is a platformer game that breaks through the stage to avoid obstacles by stepping on the treadmill. The player aims to avoid various obstacles in the game and finally catch the boss monster. As its name suggests, it is easy among platformer games and consists of difficulty levels that are good for introducing.
